title: Hon. Marcus Garvey on His Return to the U.S.A.
source: G. Robert Vincent Voice Library Collection, MSU Libraries

features.name: energy
features.description: Indicator to the loudness of the signal

features.name: spectralCentroid
features.description: “Brightness” of a sound, e.g. a bass guitar (low spectral centroid) and a trumpet (high spectral centroid)

features.name: spectralKurtosis
features.description: Indicate “pitchiness / tonality” of a sound, where 0.0 is not tonal, and 1.0 is very tonal

features.name: spectralSpread
features.description: Differentiate between noisy (high spectral spread) and pitched sounds (low spectral spread)

features.name: perceptualSharpness
features.description: Perceived sharpness, where 0.0 is not sharp (e.g. bass-drum) and 1.0 very sharp (e.g. snare-drum).
